home_about_kolorete.label: About Kolorete
home_about_kolorete.default: Kolorete Marketing started on June 16, 2016 as a simple online shop with physical store at Santa Rosa Laguna. Kolorete Marketing is an online shopping center for fashion, trends, styles and other general merchandise with a marketing system that helps every individual to earn while shopping or reselling products.
